definition: Lingering Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu
old variant of 留[liu2]
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
old variant of 留[liu2]
surname Yuan
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Chinese garden has a rockery, such as the Lingering Garden crown yunfeng.
sentences.chinese: 中国园林都有假山，如留园冠云峰。

sentences.english: The entrance was specially built for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 留园的这个入口处是为游人准备的。

sentences.english: The name Liuyuan or Lingering Garden actually means lingering in the world.
sentences.chinese: 柳园的名称或留园实际上意味着在世界上挥之不去。

sentences.english: One of the things that's very special about this garden is the colorful variety of such windows.
sentences.chinese: 在留园中，与众不同的就是色彩丰富，形状各异花窗。
